alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 3:59PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Columbia, northeastern Suwannee and southeastern Hamilton Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 359 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near White Springs to 6 miles northwest of Columbia to near Ichetucknee Spring. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake City, White Springs, Columbia, Wellborn, Five Points, Watertown, Winfield and Suwannee Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Suwannee
